cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to an invalid string type will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP to an out-of-range value will cause antenna configuration error and lead to transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP 設定為超出範圍的值會導致天線配置錯誤，並造成傳輸失敗。
